description: Models attribution to an individual or group for contribution towards some content item.
title: Credit for a piece of content.

___description.description: A description/short bio of the contributor.

___url.description: A url to some deeper set of information about the contributor.

___org.description: The (optional) organization the contributor belongs to.

___role.description: The role the contributor played in the content.

$eref.description: Holds attributes of an ANS image component.
$eref.title: An image.

___social_links.description: A list of social links (twitter, facebook, etc) for this contributor.

$eref.description: A tuple of social media information (e.g. Facebook url, Twitter handle, etc)

___url.description: The profile/account page to link to on the site

___site.description: The name of the social media site (e.g. twitter, facebook, etc)
